name: mini-teabag caddy
notes:
the mini-teabag caddy crochet pattern is a delightful and functional project designed to hold your favorite teabags in style. it can be crafted to match an existing crochet coaster and holder set or made as a charming standalone gift for the tea lover in your life.

the pattern features a delicate bloom at its center and can be personalized by adding a charm to make it uniquely yours or tailored for a special friend. the caddy easily accommodates one dozen teabags.  the design works up quickly and is a thoughtful handmade accessory that is both beautiful and practical.

skill level:  intermediate


materials:
yarn:  yarnspirations™ peaches & creme™, stripey™ green stripes or linen, caddy - 31 yards

hooks:  susan bates® 2.25, 4 mm

charm (optional): charm me® #2151389 resin coffee mug 

notions: yarn needle, scissors, measuring tape, place stitch marker (1)

gauge: 16 sts & 8 rows = 4 inches in dc.
rounds 1-12 approximately length 3.25" x  width 2.75"

stitch key:
adjustable loop
bl – back loop
blsc – back loop single crochet
blsl st – back loop slip stitch
ch – chain
dc – double crochet
hdc – half double crochet
rep – repeat
sc – single crochet
sl st or sl sts – slip stitch or slip stitches 
st or sts – stitch or stitches
tr – treble crochet
yo – yarn over

specialty stitch:  2 dc cluster
